import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Card, CardHeader, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup, FormInput, FormSelect, FormTextarea, Button } from "shards-react"; const SettingsFormOne = ({ title }) => (
{title}
{ }} /> { }} /> { }} /> { }} />
); SettingsFormOne.propTypes = { /** * The component's title. */ title: PropTypes.string }; SettingsFormOne.defaultProps = { title: "Details" }; export default SettingsFormOne;
